projects.name: School Project - Witch Hunt
projects.description: Worked with three other team members to develop, document, and present a multiplayer browser game.
projects.stack: C#, AngularJS, T-SQL, Entity Framework, Web API 2, Bootstrap
responsibilities: Designed and developed a system for players to interact and chat in real-time using Web Sockets
Game includes lobbies, player profiles, and leader boards.
